description.value:
Trigger One of your team children within 60 feet who can see or hear you fails a check by 1 or critically fails a check by 1, and gaining a +1 circumstance bonus would change the result of the check

Effect You call out a quick bit of advice, make an emphatic gesture, or use a more subtle technique to guide away from failure. The triggering team child gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their check, changing the result from a critical failure to a failure or from a failure to a success. However, your focus on your team child distracts you from your own challenges. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.
